headline.main: Valeant Chief to Testify Before Senate in April

snippet: The disclosure that J. Michael Pearson had been called to testify on Capitol Hill sent Valeant’s shares sharply down.
abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals shares fall more than 7 percent on news that chief executive J Michael Pearson will be asked to testify before Senate committee about quick rise in drug prices.
